div.p: At last I got a letter from you and I cant tell you how glad I was I feel a lots better and I read it. I know is is not your fault as I have said before I know the reason for not getting any mail in so long a time. But cant tell you I think everything will be alright for a while any way. I dont see why you dont get my letters for I write you every week that comes. I dont do that well to any body else except mother I always find time to writ you both once a week when I have had my supper and am feeling fine
except I am real tired for I have been driving a big truck all day Mad 74 miles to day hauling big racks to build a road some of the roads are

rough so you know what it is to drive a light car over rough roads and this thing I am driving is awful heavy But if that helps to win the war I dont mind it a bit. Yesterday was Sunday so I went to town to look the place over. I drove the truck in with a bunch of the men. We can go to town every sunday if we want to but I hardly ever go but yesterday was My day to drive so I had to go. We take a time about as we have several trucks We are in a little town but the place here is a pretty good size place. I saw some real nice looking girls there about the best looking I have seen in France.
Good looking girls are scarce in France or at least I think so Well I hope you had a good time in Memphis I know I could if I was there I could have a good time

in Oakfield if I was on there. I thin it is rreal nice for Lynn to be so close to home that preache can go and see him. Does he think he will come across on the side or stay there? Well would be real nice to come across but I have been here as long as I want to stay. The time passes pretty fast though we will soon be over there Months dont seem that long. But we have something to think about over here (our work) and we didnt in the states. I sure hope Uncle Robert dont get in trouble over running in the engine
I have got to write mother as I didnt get to write her yes-terday. And we are going to have a picture show as the Y M C A to night Will close write me real soon and dont for get me
I also got a letter from aunt Annie today will set some
